trans-unit.source: TYPO3 Professional Web Content Management System
trans-unit.target: TYPO3 Professional Web Content Management System

trans-unit.source:
TYPO3 is a flexible and professional Open Source Web-CMS based on PHP and MySQL.

TYPO3 is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

%s %s
trans-unit.target:
TYPO3 is a flexible and professional Open Source Web-CMS based on PHP and MySQL.

TYPO3 is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

%s %s

trans-unit.source: Visit typo3.org/community/ if you want to know why TYPO3 rocks.
trans-unit.target: Visit typo3.org/community/ if you want to know why TYPO3 rocks.

trans-unit.source:
Visit typo3.org/teams/core/members/ for the complete member list.

The SVN Repository and the ChangeLog can be found here.
trans-unit.target:
Visit typo3.org/teams/core/members/ for the complete member list.

The SVN Repository and the ChangeLog can be found here.

trans-unit.source: This is a list of the people who contributed to the extensions you're using in your installation.
trans-unit.target: This is a list of the people who contributed to the extensions you're using in your installation.

trans-unit.source: Displays the basic facts about the TYPO3 application, version and licensing terms.
trans-unit.target: Displays the basic facts about the TYPO3 application, version and licensing terms.

trans-unit.source:
It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.
Thank you for making this great Content Management System even better with your help!
trans-unit.target:
It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.
